scripts.all: pnpm repositories && pnpm flock && pnpm gateway && pnpm auth
scripts.docker:flock: docker build -t flock --target serve  --build-arg SERVICE_PATH=./packages/client/flock --build-arg PACKAGE_NAME=flock --build-arg PNPM_VERSION=9.0.6 --build-arg EXPOSED_PORT=4200 .
scripts.docker:gateway: docker build -t gateway --target deploy  --build-arg SERVICE_PATH=./packages/server/gateway --build-arg PACKAGE_NAME=gateway --build-arg PNPM_VERSION=9.0.6 --build-arg EXPOSED_PORT=3333 .
scripts.docker:auth: docker build -t gateway --target deploy  --build-arg SERVICE_PATH=./packages/server/auth-server --build-arg PACKAGE_NAME=auth-server --build-arg PNPM_VERSION=9.0.6 --build-arg EXPOSED_PORT=3333 .
scripts.local:scylla:sm: sudo systemctl status scylla-manager.service && sudo systemctl start scylla-manager-agent
